job.title: Software Engineer 2021
job.description: As a Software Engineer at Lucid Software you will be helping to build our worldclass web applications that push the boundaries of what is possible in your browser They are powerful HTML5JavaScript applications that use a state of the art tech stack like Angular TypeScript Scala and AWS to craft a user experience that feels like a desktop applicationbrbrWe are looking for extraordinary Software Engineers to join our team immediately who are ready to build creative applications that customers love You will have a significant influence on our strategy by helping to define product features drive the system architecture and spearhead best practices to create a quality product If you know how to deliver are deeply technical and highly innovative and relish the opportunity to delight customers with pioneering solutions to challenging problems we want to talk to youbrbrOur mission is to help teams see and build the future And we hold true to our core values of 1 Innovation in everything we do 2 Passion amp excellence in every area 3 Providing individual empowerment initiative and ownership and 4 Teamwork over egobrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliDesign develop test deploy maintain and improve softwareliliManage project priorities deadlines and deliverablesliliCollaborate with team members to set and achieve team goalsliliOther duties as assignedbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliCompleted a BS or MS Degree in Computer Science or in a related technical field with a minor in Computer ScienceliliHigh academic performance in Computer Science coursesliliCommitment to teamwork and strong communication skills to both business and technical partnersbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliExperience with JavaScriptliliExperience with CSSHTMLDOM manipulationliliUnderstanding of MySQL or other relational databaseliliBias towards finding solutions vs shutting down ideasliliDetail oriented and organizedbrliulLIMJ6
